original: rin chen gtso dang 'od dpag tu med dang rnam par snang mdzad dang don yod grub pa dang / rdo rje @146b sems dpa'i rang bzhin nyid do //🔽de gnyi ga nag po rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba mtha' dag yin te /🔽brtan pa dang g-yo ba dbang po dang yul gyi rang bzhin no //🔽thabs dang shes rab ces pa ni rdo rje dang padma'o //
analyzed: rin chen gtso dang 'od dpag tu med dang rnam par snang mdzad dang don yod grub pa dang / rdo rje @146b sems dpa'i rang bzhin nyid do // de gnyi ga nag po rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba mtha' dag yin te / brtan pa dang g-yo ba dbang po dang yul gyi rang bzhin no // thabs dang shes rab ces pa ni rdo rje dang padma'o //
translated: The nature of the five buddhas is the nature of the five elements, the nature of the five elements is the nature of the five buddhas.🔽The nature of the five buddhas is the nature of the five aggregates, the nature of the five aggregates is the nature of the five buddhas.🔽The nature of the five buddhas is the nature of the five elements, the nature of the five elements is the nature of the five buddhas.

original: kun du ru skyes zhes pa ni /🔽dga' ba gsum mo //
analyzed: kun du ru skyes zhes pa ni / dga' ba gsum mo //
translated: The nature of the five buddhas is the nature of the five aggregates, the nature of the five aggregates is the nature of the five buddhas.

original: dngos po dngos med ces pa ni bden pa gnyis so ;🔽/ rdo rje sems dpa' zhes pa ni rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: dngos po dngos med ces pa ni bden pa gnyis so ; / rdo rje sems dpa' zhes pa ni rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa'i ye shes so //
translated: The nature of the five buddhas is the nature of the five elements, the nature of the five elements is the nature of the five buddhas.🔽The nature of the five buddhas is the nature of the five aggregates, the nature of the five aggregates is the nature of the five buddhas.

original: brjod ces pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa'o //🔽da ni / phyag rgya chen po'i dbang bskur ba //
analyzed: brjod ces pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa'o // da ni / phyag rgya chen po'i dbang bskur ba //
translated: The nature of the five buddhas is the nature of the five elements, the nature of the five elements is the nature of the five buddhas.🔽The nature of the five buddhas is the nature of the five aggregates, the nature of the five aggregates is the nature of the five buddhas.

original: ji bzhin ye shes bde chen yod //
analyzed: ji bzhin ye shes bde chen yod //
translated: The nature of the five buddhas is the nature of the five elements, the nature of the five elements is the nature of the five buddhas.🔽The nature of the five buddhas is the nature of the five aggregates, the nature of the five aggregates is the nature of the five buddhas.🔽The nature of the five buddhas is the nature of the five elements, the nature of the five elements is the nature of the five buddhas.🔽The nature of the five buddhas is the nature of the five aggregates, the nature of the five aggregates is the nature of the five buddhas.

original: de nyid 'di yi byin rlabs yin //🔽gzhan las dkyil 'khor 'byung ba med //
analyzed: de nyid 'di yi byin rlabs yin //🔽gzhan las dkyil 'khor 'byung ba med //
translated: The nature of the five buddhas is the nature of the five elements, the

original: ces pa sems la bzhag nas rdo rje snying pos gsol ba //
analyzed: ces pa sems la bzhag nas rdo rje snying pos gsol ba //
translated: Having placed this in his mind, Vajragarbha asked:

original: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor 'di //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor 'di //
translated: This yoga of the completion stage

original: dam pa'i bde ba bde chen 'dod //
analyzed: dam pa'i bde ba bde chen 'dod //
translated: is the desire for the bliss of the great bliss of the sublime.

original: rdzogs pa bsgom pa med pa ste //
analyzed: rdzogs pa bsgom pa med pa ste //
translated: There is no meditation on the complete,

original: bskyed pas dgos pa ci zhig mchis //
analyzed: bskyed pas dgos pa ci zhig mchis //
translated: so what is the purpose of the generation stage?

original: bde chen de de'i bde ba'o //
analyzed: bde chen de de'i bde ba'o //
translated: That great bliss is its bliss.

original: dam pa'i zhes pa ni de yod pa'o //
analyzed: dam pa'i zhes pa ni de yod pa'o //
translated: The sublime is the existence of that.

original: bde ba zhes pa ni ye shes te ;
analyzed: bde ba zhes pa ni ye shes te ;
translated: Bliss is gnosis,

original: / bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rang bzhin rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: / bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rang bzhin rtogs pa'o //
translated: the realization of the nature of the generation stage.

original: gang yang bde ba chen po de yang ni rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor 'di'o //
analyzed: gang yang bde ba chen po de yang ni rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor 'di'o //
translated: That great bliss is also this yoga of the complete.

original: 'dod ces pa ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i bsgom pa med pa de bskyed pa'i rim pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i bsgom pa dgos pa ci yod de /
analyzed: 'dod ces pa ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i bsgom pa med pa de bskyed pa'i rim pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i bsgom pa dgos pa ci yod de /
translated: Desire is the nonmeditation of the completion stage. What is the purpose of the meditation of the generation stage and the completion stage?

original: dgos pa ci yang med pa yin no zhes pa zhus pa'o //
analyzed: dgos pa ci yang med pa yin no zhes pa zhus pa'o //
translated: There is no purpose at all.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Bhagavān replied:

original: ae ma byang chub sems dpa' che //
analyzed: ae ma byang chub sems dpa' che //
translated: Amazing! Great bodhisattva!

original: dad pa'i shugs kyis chud re zos //
analyzed: dad pa'i shugs kyis chud re zos //
translated: You are filled with the force of faith.

original: ae ma'o zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das nyid ngo mtshar bar gyur pa'o //
analyzed: ae ma'o zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das nyid ngo mtshar bar gyur pa'o //
translated: A la la is the exclamation of the Lord Himself, who is amazed.

original: byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying po 'di gal te de skad du 'dri ba des chud re zos te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying po 'di gal te de skad du 'dri ba des chud re zos te /
translated: If this Bodhisattva-Mahasattva Vajragarbha asks in this way, he will be disappointed,

original: chos nyams pa ste 'dis chos ma shes pas tshad bya bar nus pa ma yin no //
analyzed: chos nyams pa ste 'dis chos ma shes pas tshad bya bar nus pa ma yin no //
translated: and his Dharma will be lost, for he is not able to understand the Dharma by this [question].

original: ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How so?

original: dad pa'i shugs kyis te dad pa'i rjes su 'brang bas chos kyi sku tsam nyid 'dis nges pa yin gyi sprul pa dang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku gnyis ni ma yin no //
analyzed: dad pa'i shugs kyis te dad pa'i rjes su 'brang bas chos kyi sku tsam nyid 'dis nges pa yin gyi sprul pa dang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku gnyis ni ma yin no //
translated: By the power of faith, by following faith, he is certain only of the Dharma Body, not of the two Bodies of Transformation and Enjoyment.

original: bdag nyid kyi thugs ngo mtshar skyes pas rdo rje snying po la slar gsungs pa /
analyzed: bdag nyid kyi thugs ngo mtshar skyes pas rdo rje snying po la slar gsungs pa /
translated: Out of amazement in His own mind, He speaks again to Vajragarbha:

original: lus kyi dngos med gang las bde ba smra bar mi nus so //
analyzed: lus kyi dngos med gang las bde ba smra bar mi nus so //
translated: The non-existence of the body cannot be spoken of as bliss.

original: khyab dang khyab byed tshul gyis ni //
analyzed: khyab dang khyab byed tshul gyis ni //
translated: By the method of pervader and pervaded,

original: bde bas 'gro ba khyab pa nyid //
analyzed: bde bas 'gro ba khyab pa nyid //
translated: The world is pervaded by bliss.

original: lus kyi sgras bsags pa'i mtshan nyid phung po lnga'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: lus kyi sgras bsags pa'i mtshan nyid phung po lnga'i bdag nyid do //
translated: By the word body, [it means] the five aggregates, which are characterized by accumulation.

original: de'i dngos med bde ba ni nyams su myong ba'i ye @147a * //
analyzed: de'i dngos med bde ba ni nyams su myong ba'i ye @147a * //
translated: The non-entity of that is the gnosis of the experience of bliss.

original: shes so // gang las bde ba yin pa smra ba nyid du mi nus so //
analyzed: shes so // gang las bde ba yin pa smra ba nyid du mi nus so //
translated: It cannot be said from what bliss is.

original: de'i phyir khyab par bya ba dang khyab par byed pa'i tshul gyis te /
analyzed: de'i phyir khyab par bya ba dang khyab par byed pa'i tshul gyis te /
translated: Therefore, by the manner of the pervaded and the pervader,

original: khyab bya ni lus so //
analyzed: khyab bya ni lus so //
translated: the pervaded is the body.

original: khyab byed ni bde ba'o //
analyzed: khyab byed ni bde ba'o //
translated: The pervader is bliss.

original: de lta bu'i rang bzhin gyi bde ba'i ye shes kyis khams gsum gyi 'gro ba la khyab pa yin no //
analyzed: de lta bu'i rang bzhin gyi bde ba'i ye shes kyis khams gsum gyi 'gro ba la khyab pa yin no //
translated: The gnosis of bliss of that nature pervades the beings of the three realms.

original: yang na lus kyi dngos med ni //
analyzed: yang na lus kyi dngos med ni //
translated: Or, the non-entity of the body

original: gzugs dngos po med pa'i bdag med pa'i rang bzhin gyi rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs dngos po med pa'i bdag med pa'i rang bzhin gyi rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
translated: is the non-entity of form, the nature of Nairātmya-Vajradhara.

original: de yang lus ni bsags pa'i mtshan nyid de /
analyzed: de yang lus ni bsags pa'i mtshan nyid de /
translated: Moreover, the body has the characteristic of an accumulation.

original: 'di lus kyang yin la dngos med kyang yin pas lus kyi dngos med do //
analyzed: 'di lus kyang yin la dngos med kyang yin pas lus kyi dngos med do //
translated: Since this is a body and also a non-entity, it is the non-entity of the body.

original: de la yod pa'i bsags pa'i bdag nyid rdo rje 'dzin pa bdag med ma'i rang bzhin nges so //
analyzed: de la yod pa'i bsags pa'i bdag nyid rdo rje 'dzin pa bdag med ma'i rang bzhin nges so //
translated: The nature of Vajradhara, who exists in that, is ascertained as the nature of Nairātmya.

original: gang las ni chos 'byung las so //
analyzed: gang las ni chos 'byung las so //
translated: From what? From the source of phenomena.

original: bde ba ni lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: bde ba ni lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes so //
translated: Bliss is the innate pristine awareness.

original: de yang bde ba smra bar mi nus so ni ngag gi lam las 'das pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de yang bde ba smra bar mi nus so ni ngag gi lam las 'das pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And that cannot be described as bliss, because it is beyond the range of speech.

original: de nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir /
translated: For that very reason,

original: khyab bya khyab byed tshul gyis ni khyab pa ni lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba'i ye shes kyis so //
analyzed: khyab bya khyab byed tshul gyis ni khyab pa ni lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba'i ye shes kyis so //
translated: it is pervaded by the pervasion of the pervaded and the pervader, by the innate pristine awareness of bliss.

original: 'gro ba khyab pa nyid ni 'gro ba dang dbyer med pa nyid kyis yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi don to //
analyzed: 'gro ba khyab pa nyid ni 'gro ba dang dbyer med pa nyid kyis yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi don to //
translated: And it is pervaded by the pervasion of the pervaded and the pervader, by the pristine awareness of reality, because it is inseparable from the pervasion of the world.

original: de nyid dpes bstan par bya ba ni //
analyzed: de nyid dpes bstan par bya ba ni //
translated: That very thing is to be taught by means of an example.

original: ji ltar me tog la gnas dri //
analyzed: ji ltar me tog la gnas dri //
translated: The fragrance that rests in a flower

original: me tog dngos med shes mi 'gyur //
analyzed: me tog dngos med shes mi 'gyur //
translated: is not known if the flower is not there.

original: de bzhin gzugs sogs dngos med pas //
analyzed: de bzhin gzugs sogs dngos med pas //
translated: In the same way, the absence of form and so on

original: bde ba nyid kyang dmigs mi 'gyur //
analyzed: bde ba nyid kyang dmigs mi 'gyur //
translated: is not perceived as bliss.

original: ji ltar me tog la brten pa'i dri me tog gi dngos po med na mi shes shing mi rtogs pa de bzhin du gzugs la sogs pa'i dngos po med na bde ba dmigs par mi 'gyur ba nyid yin no //
analyzed: ji ltar me tog la brten pa'i dri me tog gi dngos po med na mi shes shing mi rtogs pa de bzhin du gzugs la sogs pa'i dngos po med na bde ba dmigs par mi 'gyur ba nyid yin no //
translated: Just as the fragrance that rests in a flower is not known or perceived if the flower is not there, in the same way, the absence of form and so on is not perceived as bliss.

original: de'i phyir gzugs la brten pa nyid gzugs med pa'i dngos po khyad par cung zad tsam byin gyis brlabs nas 'dra ba yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir gzugs la brten pa nyid gzugs med pa'i dngos po khyad par cung zad tsam byin gyis brlabs nas 'dra ba yin te /
translated: Therefore, the state of formlessness is merely a slight blessing of the state of form, and they are similar.

original: de thams cad du mtshungs pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de thams cad du mtshungs pa ni ma yin no //
translated: But they are not the same in every respect.

original: ci yin du chug kyang de'i bdag nyid kyis rtogs par byas te /🔽gzugs nyid gzugs med pa can no //
analyzed: ci yin du chug kyang de'i bdag nyid kyis rtogs par byas te / gzugs nyid gzugs med pa can no //
translated: Even if they were, they are understood to be of the same nature.🔽Form itself is formless.

original: gzugs med pa nyid du gzugs can yin no //
analyzed: gzugs med pa nyid du gzugs can yin no //
translated: Formlessness itself is form.

original: yang na / ji ltar me tog la brten dri //🔽zhes pa ni /
analyzed: yang na / ji ltar me tog la brten dri // zhes pa ni /
translated: Just as fragrance is based on a flower,🔽that consciousness is based on a flower.

original: di shes pa de re zhig me tog la brten pa yin pas re zhig shes shing rtogs na /
analyzed: di shes pa de re zhig me tog la brten pa yin pas re zhig shes shing rtogs na /
translated: If it is understood and realized,

original: me tog nyid ni gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i phyir /
analyzed: me tog nyid ni gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i phyir /
translated: the flower itself is primordially unborn.

original: dngos po med pas na skye ba bkag pas /
analyzed: dngos po med pas na skye ba bkag pas /
translated: Since it is nonexistent, arising is negated.

original: dri 'dir nges par shes shing rtogs pa med /
analyzed: dri 'dir nges par shes shing rtogs pa med /
translated: Therefore, fragrance is not definitely understood and realized here.

original: gang dri'i shes pa rtogs pa'i shes pa gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang dri'i shes pa rtogs pa'i shes pa gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because there is no other consciousness that realizes the consciousness of fragrance.

original: de bzhin du bde ba yang dag pa'i ye shes @147b dmigs su med pa nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin du bde ba yang dag pa'i ye shes @147b dmigs su med pa nyid de /
translated: Likewise, bliss is the nonobservation of true wisdom.

original: mi dmigs pa'i rang bzhin nyid yin no //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa'i rang bzhin nyid yin no //
translated: It is the nature of non-apprehension.

original: ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How so?

original: gzugs sogs dngos med pas te /
analyzed: gzugs sogs dngos med pas te /
translated: By the non-existence of form, etc.

original: gzugs la sogs pa rnams kyi gzugs kyi dngos po med pa des ni bdag med pa ma bsgom pas gzugs la sogs pa yin pa'i don to //
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa rnams kyi gzugs kyi dngos po med pa des ni bdag med pa ma bsgom pas gzugs la sogs pa yin pa'i don to //
translated: By the non-existence of the entity of form, etc., one should meditate on selflessness, which means form, etc.

original: 'dis ci bstan na /
analyzed: 'dis ci bstan na /
translated: What does this teach?

original: rdzogs pa'i rim pa bsgom pa med par grub pa nyid 'di'i phyogs te /
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i rim pa bsgom pa med par grub pa nyid 'di'i phyogs te /
translated: The position of this [tantra] is that without meditating on the completion stage, [one attains] perfection.

original: ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How so?

original: bskyed pa'i rim pas rtogs pa'i phyir //
analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pas rtogs pa'i phyir //
translated: Because of realization through the generation stage.

original: zhes dgongs so //
analyzed: zhes dgongs so //
translated: This is the intention.

original: bskyed pa'i rim pa spangs nas rdzogs pa'i rim pa med pa nyid yin pa'i don to //
analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pa spangs nas rdzogs pa'i rim pa med pa nyid yin pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that without the generation stage, there is no completion stage.

original: de skad du yang /
analyzed: de skad du yang /
translated: Thus it is said:

original: 'di la bsal ba ci yang med //
analyzed: 'di la bsal ba ci yang med //
translated: Here there is nothing to be removed,

original: bsnan par bya ba'ang cung zad med //
analyzed: bsnan par bya ba'ang cung zad med //
translated: Nor is there the slightest thing to be added.

original: yang dag nyid la yang dag lta //
analyzed: yang dag nyid la yang dag lta //
translated: See reality in reality.

original: yang dag mthong na rnam par grol //
analyzed: yang dag mthong na rnam par grol //
translated: When reality is seen, one is liberated.

original: zhes pa'o // 'di nyid gang bden pa mthong zhing chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin rtogs pa la ni /
analyzed: zhes pa'o // 'di nyid gang bden pa mthong zhing chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin rtogs pa la ni /
translated: This very [reality] is for one who sees the truth and realizes the nature of all phenomena.

original: ma rig pa glo bur gyi dri ma rnams kyis rtag tu dngos po'i de kho na nyid rtogs pa med de /
analyzed: ma rig pa glo bur gyi dri ma rnams kyis rtag tu dngos po'i de kho na nyid rtogs pa med de /
translated: The reality of things is never realized by those who are obscured by the adventitious defilement of nescience.

original: dngos po'i de kho na nyid rtogs pa yang ma rig pa las ldog pas dngos po'i de kho na nyid rtogs pa med cing gnyi gar yang dngos po'i de kho na nyid rtogs pa med do //
analyzed: dngos po'i de kho na nyid rtogs pa yang ma rig pa las ldog pas dngos po'i de kho na nyid rtogs pa med cing gnyi gar yang dngos po'i de kho na nyid rtogs pa med do //
translated: And since the realization of the reality of things is the opposite of nescience, the reality of things is not realized by either of the two.

original: dngos po'i de kho na nyid rtogs pa nyid yang dag pa'i ye shes yin no //
analyzed: dngos po'i de kho na nyid rtogs pa nyid yang dag pa'i ye shes yin no //
translated: The realization of the reality of things is itself the authentic intuition.

original: de nyid kyi phyir de'i gnas skabs su son pa rnams kyi yang ma rtogs na ci zhig 'byung bar 'gyur /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir de'i gnas skabs su son pa rnams kyi yang ma rtogs na ci zhig 'byung bar 'gyur /
translated: Therefore, if it is not realized even by those who have attained that stage, what will happen?

original: de'i phyir glo bur gyi dri ma bsal bar bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i phyir glo bur gyi dri ma bsal bar bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, in order to remove the adventitious defilement,

original: ma rig pa rtag par gnas pa rnams lha'i rnam par dag pa'i dngos po bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: ma rig pa rtag par gnas pa rnams lha'i rnam par dag pa'i dngos po bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: the stage of generation is the divine reality of purification for those who are always obscured by nescience.

original: de nyid mnyam pa nyid du mngon du gyur nas de 'di zhes rnam par gcad par mi nus pas na /
analyzed: de nyid mnyam pa nyid du mngon du gyur nas de 'di zhes rnam par gcad par mi nus pas na /
translated: When that is realized as sameness, it cannot be defined as this or that.

original: rdzogs pa'i rim pa bskyed par bya ba yin te /
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i rim pa bskyed par bya ba yin te /
translated: The perfection stage is to be generated.

original: lha nyid kyi rnam par dag pa dang / de bzhin nyid kyi rnam par dag pa 'di gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med la gcad du med pa'o //
analyzed: lha nyid kyi rnam par dag pa dang / de bzhin nyid kyi rnam par dag pa 'di gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med la gcad du med pa'o //
translated: The purity of the deity and the purity of thusness are nondual, undifferentiated, and indivisible.

original: de ltar ni /
analyzed: de ltar ni /
translated: Thus,

original: bskyed pa dgos pa ci zhig mchis //
analyzed: bskyed pa dgos pa ci zhig mchis //
translated: what is the purpose of the generation stage?

original: zhes pa gang 'di rdo rje snying pos zhus pa de thams cad nyid dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral bas chos nyams pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes pa gang 'di rdo rje snying pos zhus pa de thams cad nyid dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral bas chos nyams pa yin no //
translated: This question asked by Vajra Essence is all due to the degeneration of the Dharma because of being separated from the spiritual friend.

original: ae ma'o byang chub sems dpa' che /
analyzed: ae ma'o byang chub sems dpa' che /
translated: Amazing! The great bodhisattva

original: dad pa'i shugs kyis chud re zos //
analyzed: dad pa'i shugs kyis chud re zos //
translated: is filled with the force of faith.

original: zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyis sems bskyed pa ste slar yang bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis nye bar bstan par gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyis sems bskyed pa ste slar yang bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis nye bar bstan par gsungs so //
translated: This is the generation of the mind of the Bhagavān, and again the Bhagavān himself teaches the explanation.

original: bskyed pa'i rim pa'i dgos pa chen po gsungs @148a * //
analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pa'i dgos pa chen po gsungs @148a * //
translated: The great purpose of the generation stage is taught:

original: pa ; dngos dang dngos po med pa dang // dngos po rtogs phyir sangs rgyas nga /
analyzed: pa ; dngos dang dngos po med pa dang // dngos po rtogs phyir sangs rgyas nga /
translated: The Buddha is for the realization of entity, nonentity, and entity.

original: phyag dang zhal gyi rnam pa'i tshul nyid kyis bdag nyid re zhig thams cad mkhyen pa'i dngos po ste /
analyzed: phyag dang zhal gyi rnam pa'i tshul nyid kyis bdag nyid re zhig thams cad mkhyen pa'i dngos po ste /
translated: By the very mode of having hands and faces, I am the entity of omniscience,

original: dngos po'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: dngos po'i rang bzhin no //
translated: the nature of things.

original: bdag nyid dngos po med pa yin te /
analyzed: bdag nyid dngos po med pa yin te /
translated: I am the non-entity,

original: phyag dang zhal gyi rnam pa'i tshul nyid rang bzhin gyis gzugs med pa yin no //

analyzed: bskyed pa'i dgos pa ci zhig mchis zhes pa gang 'di rdo rje snying po'i rtog pa thams cad nyid du mi rigs pa yin no //
translated: What is the purpose of the stage of generation? It is not reasonable that all the concepts of the vajra essence are just that.

original: lus kyi dngos med gang las bde //
analyzed: lus kyi dngos med gang las bde //
translated: From what is the bliss that is not the body?

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis so //
translated: And so on. The thirty-two marks are mentioned.

original: gtso bo dpe byad brgyad cu ldan //
analyzed: gtso bo dpe byad brgyad cu ldan //
translated: The chief has the eighty minor marks.

original: ston pa zhes pa 'dis ni bcom ldan 'das so //
analyzed: ston pa zhes pa 'dis ni bcom ldan 'das so //
translated: By “teacher,” the Bhagavān is meant.

original: bskyed pa'i rim pa nyid rdzogs pa'i rim pa la rdzogs pa'i rim pa nyid bskyed pa'i rim pa ste /
analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pa nyid rdzogs pa'i rim pa la rdzogs pa'i rim pa nyid bskyed pa'i rim pa ste /
translated: The stage of generation itself is the stage of completion, and the stage of completion itself is the stage of generation.

original: 'di gnyis ni gnyis su dbyer med pa la gcad du med pa'o //
analyzed: 'di gnyis ni gnyis su dbyer med pa la gcad du med pa'o //
translated: These two are indivisible, and so are not divided.

original: gzhan yang dbyangs bco lnga yongs su gyur pa las bdag med ma la sogs pa'i mkha' 'gro ma bco lnga'o //
analyzed: gzhan yang dbyangs bco lnga yongs su gyur pa las bdag med ma la sogs pa'i mkha' 'gro ma bco lnga'o //
translated: Moreover, the fifteen vowels are the fifteen dakinis such as Vajravarahi, and so forth.

original: de rnams kyang tsheg drag gi mtha' can dbyangs bcu drug rnam par dag pa thabs dang shes rab rnam par dag pas nyis 'gyur la rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi rang bzhin gyi mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa'i phyag dang zhabs nyid cha shas med pa'i
analyzed: de rnams kyang tsheg drag gi mtha' can dbyangs bcu drug rnam par dag pa thabs dang shes rab rnam par dag pas nyis 'gyur la rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi rang bzhin gyi mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa'i phyag dang zhabs nyid cha shas med pa'i
translated: They are also the sixteen vowels ending with the visarga, the thirty-two channels, the thirty-two marks, and the two-fold purity of method and wisdom.

original: rang bzhin mkha' 'gro ma yongs su gyur pa nyid sprul pa'i sku re zhig 'bab po //
analyzed: rang bzhin mkha' 'gro ma yongs su gyur pa nyid sprul pa'i sku re zhig 'bab po //
translated: The hand and foot of the indivisible nature of the dakini's complete transformation is the nirmanakaya.

original: dpe byad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su gyur pa'i rnam par dag pa rnams thabs kyi rang bzhin nyid sprul pa'i bdag nyid 'dus byas thams cad pa rnam par chags pa'i thugs mnga' ba'i phyir /
analyzed: dpe byad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su gyur pa'i rnam par dag pa rnams thabs kyi rang bzhin nyid sprul pa'i bdag nyid 'dus byas thams cad pa rnam par chags pa'i thugs mnga' ba'i phyir /
translated: The major marks are also like that. The completely transformed tathāgatas, whose nature is method, are the nature of emanation, all conditioned things, and possess the mind of passion.

original: sen mo zangs kyi mdog lta bu zhes bya ba la sogs pa rnam par shes pa'i rnam par dag par bshad pas chos kyi sku rab tu bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sen mo zangs kyi mdog lta bu zhes bya ba la sogs pa rnam par shes pa'i rnam par dag par bshad pas chos kyi sku rab tu bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Since they are explained as the purity of consciousness, they are the dharma body.

original: a'a li k'a li'i n'a da phreng gnyis kyang thabs dang shes rab kyi rang bzhin gyis /
analyzed: a'a li k'a li'i n'a da phreng gnyis kyang thabs dang shes rab kyi rang bzhin gyis /
translated: The two garlands of alikāli nāda are the nature of method and wisdom.

original: da dha da dha ya la rnams cung zad nga ro zhan pa'i yi ge gang de la bsnan pas /
analyzed: da dha da dha ya la rnams cung zad nga ro zhan pa'i yi ge gang de la bsnan pas /
translated: The letters da, dha, da, dha, ya, and la are added to those that have a slightly weak sound.

original: dbyangs sum cu rtsa gnyis dang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'i rang bzhin gyis longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o //
analyzed: dbyangs sum cu rtsa gnyis dang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'i rang bzhin gyis longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o //
translated: The nature of the thirty-two vowels and the eighty minor marks is the saṃbhogakāya.

original: de ltar longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku nyid re zhig sprul pa dang chos kyi skyed pa @155a * //
analyzed: de ltar longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku nyid re zhig sprul pa dang chos kyi skyed pa @155a * //
translated: In that way, the saṃbhogakāya is the emanation and the dharma kāya.

original: yin no // thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid ni sku gsum yin gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no //
analyzed: yin no // thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid ni sku gsum yin gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no //
translated: It is so. The three bodies have the nature of means and insight, not otherwise.

original: kun rdzob dang don dam pa dbyer med pa bden pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid de kho na yang dag pa'i ye shes bskyed pa'i rim pa la rag las pa'i rdzogs pa'i rim pa tha mi dad cing dbyer med pa yin no /
analyzed: kun rdzob dang don dam pa dbyer med pa bden pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid de kho na yang dag pa'i ye shes bskyed pa'i rim pa la rag las pa'i rdzogs pa'i rim pa tha mi dad cing dbyer med pa yin no /
translated: The reality which is the inseparability of the two truths, the relative and the ultimate, is the completion stage, which is not different from the generation stage, which is dependent on the generation of the perfect pristine awareness.

original: mun pa la ni mar me ltar //
analyzed: mun pa la ni mar me ltar //
translated: Like a lamp in the darkness,

original: de bzhin bus kyang yid ches gyis  //
analyzed: de bzhin bus kyang yid ches gyis  //
translated: so should you believe in the son.

original: zhes pa gang de'i mjug bsdu ba gsungs pa /
analyzed: zhes pa gang de'i mjug bsdu ba gsungs pa /
translated: This is the conclusion of that.

original: btsun mo'i bha ga zhes pa ste mi la sogs pa'i cha byad kyi bud med ni btsun mo'o //
analyzed: btsun mo'i bha ga zhes pa ste mi la sogs pa'i cha byad kyi bud med ni btsun mo'o //
translated: The bhaga of the queen is the bhaga of the woman who is in the form of a human, etc.

original: de'i bha ga ni chos 'byung ngo //
analyzed: de'i bha ga ni chos 'byung ngo //
translated: Her bhaga is the source of phenomena.

original: khu ba zhes bya rnam par gnas ni khu ba zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: khu ba zhes bya rnam par gnas ni khu ba zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The semen is the abiding of the name.

original: cis khyad 'phags she na /
analyzed: cis khyad 'phags she na /
translated: What is the difference?

original: bde ba can te /
analyzed: bde ba can te /
translated: It is the blissful one.

original: bde ba'i gnas bha ga yin pa'i don to //
analyzed: bde ba'i gnas bha ga yin pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the bhaga is the abode of bliss.

original: yang na btsun mo ni /
analyzed: yang na btsun mo ni /
translated: Or else, the queen is

original: rdo rje btsun mo bdag med ma'o //
analyzed: rdo rje btsun mo bdag med ma'o //
translated: the vajra queen, Nairatmya.

original: de nyid kyi bha ga ni ye shes so //
analyzed: de nyid kyi bha ga ni ye shes so //
translated: His bhaga is intuition.

original: de ru rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gzugs kyis de ltar thabs dang shes rab dbyer med par mi g-yo bar bzhugs so //
analyzed: de ru rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gzugs kyis de ltar thabs dang shes rab dbyer med par mi g-yo bar bzhugs so //
translated: In that, he abides unmoving in the form of various images, as method and intuition inseparable.

original: gang du zhe na /
analyzed: gang du zhe na /
translated: Where?

original: bde ba can du ste /
analyzed: bde ba can du ste /
translated: In Sukhavati,

original: lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes su'o //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes su'o //
translated: in the intuition of innate bliss.

original: gang gis she na /
analyzed: gang gis she na /
translated: By what?

original: khu ba zhes bya ste /
analyzed: khu ba zhes bya ste /
translated: By the semen,

original: byang chub kyi sems su brjod pa'o /
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems su brjod pa'o /
translated: which is said to be the bodhicitta.

original: de nyid kyi phyir de med pas na ni byang chub kyi sems so //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir de med pas na ni byang chub kyi sems so //
translated: Therefore, without that, there is no bodhicitta,

original: bde ba lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: bde ba lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes so //
translated: and there is no intuition of innate bliss.🔽Without that, there is no innate bliss,

original: mi 'gyur ni bde ba lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes kyang med pa'o //
analyzed: mi 'gyur ni bde ba lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes kyang med pa'o //
translated: and there is no intuition of innate bliss.

original: spangs nas ni de dor nas so //
analyzed: spangs nas ni de dor nas so //
translated: Having abandoned that,

original: de yang byang chub kyi sems kyi bdag nyid khu ba zhes bya bar mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: de yang byang chub kyi sems kyi bdag nyid khu ba zhes bya bar mi 'gyur te /
translated: that also would not be the semen, which is the nature of bodhicitta.

original: gnyi ga yang de'i bdag nyid kyi rang bzhin yin no //
analyzed: gnyi ga yang de'i bdag nyid kyi rang bzhin yin no //
translated: Both are of the nature of that.

original: nus pa med cing ltos dang bcas /
analyzed: nus pa med cing ltos dang bcas /
translated: Without power and with dependence,

original: de nyid kyi phyir khu ba de bsdu ba mdog dang dbyibs dang phyag gi rang bzhin can gyi rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir khu ba de bsdu ba mdog dang dbyibs dang phyag gi rang bzhin can gyi rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
translated: Therefore, that semen is the nature of the color, shape, and hand implements of Vajradhara.

original: de nyid lha'i rnal 'byor te gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: de nyid lha'i rnal 'byor te gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin no //
translated: That is the yoga of the deity, the nature of nonduality.

original: de'i phyir / lha'i rnal 'byor las bde ba zhes pa ni yang dag pa'i ye shes yin pa'i don to /
analyzed: de'i phyir / lha'i rnal 'byor las bde ba zhes pa ni yang dag pa'i ye shes yin pa'i don to /
translated: Therefore, “bliss from the yoga of the deity” means the meaning of true gnosis.

original: gnyis su med pa nyid du re zhig cher nyams su myong ba ni mun pa la mar me lta bu yin no //
analyzed: gnyis su med pa nyid du re zhig cher nyams su myong ba ni mun pa la mar me lta bu yin no //
translated: Nonduality is first experienced like a butter lamp in the darkness.

original: de phyir sangs rgyas dngos po min //
analyzed: de phyir sangs rgyas dngos po min //
translated: Therefore, the Buddha is not a thing.

original: dngos po med pa'i tshul yang min //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i tshul yang min //
translated: He is also not a non-thing.

original: rgyu 'di'i phyir na sangs rgyas dngos po min ni lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin gyi phyir khu ba ste /
analyzed: rgyu 'di'i phyir na sangs rgyas dngos po min ni lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin gyi phyir khu ba ste /
translated: For this reason, the Buddha is not a thing, because of the nature of the connate.

original: sangs rgyas dngos @155b po min no //
analyzed: sangs rgyas dngos @155b po min no //
translated: The Buddha is not a thing.

original: lhan cig skyes pa ni khu ba'i gzugs yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa ni khu ba'i gzugs yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The connate is the form of semen.

original: sangs rgyas dngos po med pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas dngos po med pa yang ma yin te /
translated: The Buddha is also not a non-thing.

original: gnyi ga dbyer med pa'i phyir zhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: gnyi ga dbyer med pa'i phyir zhes dgongs pa'o //
translated: because of the inseparability of the two.

original: zhal phyag rnam pa'i gzugs can nyid //
analyzed: zhal phyag rnam pa'i gzugs can nyid //
translated: The form of the face and hands,

original: mchog tu bde bas gzugs med pa //
analyzed: mchog tu bde bas gzugs med pa //
translated: the formlessness of supreme bliss,

original: khu ba'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir //
analyzed: khu ba'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir //
translated: because of the nature of semen,

original: phyag dang zhabs kyi rnam pa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: phyag dang zhabs kyi rnam pa'i rang bzhin no //
translated: the nature of the form of the hands and feet.

original: mchog tu bde bas zhes pa ni lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mchog tu bde bas zhes pa ni lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The formlessness of supreme bliss is because of the nature of the innate.

original: gzugs med pa ni gzugs las 'das pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzugs med pa ni gzugs las 'das pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The formlessness is because of the transcendence of form.

original: dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i bdag nyid kyis gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i don to //
analyzed: dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i bdag nyid kyis gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is the nature of form and formlessness by means of the nature of entity and nonentity.

original: de'i phyir 'gro kun lhan cig skyes //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'gro kun lhan cig skyes //
translated: Therefore, the innate of all migrating beings,

original: rang bzhin lhan cig skyes par brjod //
analyzed: rang bzhin lhan cig skyes par brjod //
translated: the innate is said to be the nature.

original: de'i phyir khu ba'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir lhan cig skyes pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir khu ba'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir lhan cig skyes pa'o //
translated: Therefore, the innate is because of the nature of semen.

original: de'i yang 'gro ba'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir phung po lnga'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: de'i yang 'gro ba'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir phung po lnga'i bdag nyid do //
translated: And because of the nature of migrating beings, it is the nature of the five aggregates.

original: 'gro kun lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin yang gnyug ma'i ngo bo nyid do //
analyzed: 'gro kun lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin yang gnyug ma'i ngo bo nyid do //
translated: The nature of all beings is also the innate essence.

original: brjod pa ni bstan pa'o //
analyzed: brjod pa ni bstan pa'o //
translated: The word said means taught.

original: rnam par dag pa'i sems kyis ni //
analyzed: rnam par dag pa'i sems kyis ni //
translated: The mind that is pure

original: rang bzhin mya ngan las 'das pa nyid //
analyzed: rang bzhin mya ngan las 'das pa nyid //
translated: is by nature itself nirvāṇa.

original: rang bzhin zhes pa ni yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin pa'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin zhes pa ni yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin pa'o //
translated: The word nature means just as it is.

original: de nyid mya ngan las 'das pa ni thar pa'o /
analyzed: de nyid mya ngan las 'das pa ni thar pa'o /
translated: That itself is nirvāṇa, which is liberation.

original: yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin ji ltar yin pa gsungs pa /🔽rnam par dag pa'i sems kyis ni //
analyzed: yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin ji ltar yin pa gsungs pa / rnam par dag pa'i sems kyis ni //
translated: How is it just as it is?

original: zhes pa ste /
analyzed: zhes pa ste /
translated: It is said:🔽The mind that is pure🔽.

original: phung po lnga'i rnam par dag pa dang / rnam par shes pa de gnyi ga yang gang gi tshe rnam par dag pa de yin pa'i don to //
analyzed: phung po lnga'i rnam par dag pa dang / rnam par shes pa de gnyi ga yang gang gi tshe rnam par dag pa de yin pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that when the five aggregates are pure and consciousness is pure, they are both pure.

original: 'dis ni khu ba dang lhan cig skyes pa dag dbyer med pa lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin yin la rang bzhin yang mya ngan las 'das pa ste /
analyzed: 'dis ni khu ba dang lhan cig skyes pa dag dbyer med pa lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin yin la rang bzhin yang mya ngan las 'das pa ste /
translated: This shows that the innate essence is the inseparability of the innate and the seminal essence, and that nature is nirvāṇa.

original: 'di thams cad nyid dbang po dang yul dang rnam par shes pa rnams kyi rim pa gnyis dbyer med pa rnam par dag pa nyid yin pa'i don to //
analyzed: 'di thams cad nyid dbang po dang yul dang rnam par shes pa rnams kyi rim pa gnyis dbyer med pa rnam par dag pa nyid yin pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that all of this is the purity of the two stages of the faculties, objects, and consciousnesses, which are inseparable.

original: de nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir /
translated: For that very reason,

original: lha yi sku yi rnal 'byor yang //
analyzed: lha yi sku yi rnal 'byor yang //
translated: the yoga of the deity's body

original: skyes pa tsam gyis rnam par gnas //🔽bzhin lag kha dog dbyibs las ni //
analyzed: skyes pa tsam gyis rnam par gnas // bzhin lag kha dog dbyibs las ni //
translated: is also fully present merely by being born.🔽However, the traces are ordinary

original: 'on kyang bag chags tha mal bas //
analyzed: 'on kyang bag chags tha mal bas //
translated: due to the color, shape, and so on of the face and hands.

original: lha'i sgra ni phung po lnga la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: lha'i sgra ni phung po lnga la sogs pa'o //
translated: The deity's sound is the five aggregates, and so on.

original: de rnams kyi sku ni rang bzhin no //
analyzed: de rnams kyi sku ni rang bzhin no //
translated: Their body is the nature.

original: de gang zhe na /
analyzed: de gang zhe na /
translated: What is that?

original: rnal 'byor te /
analyzed: rnal 'byor te /
translated: It is yoga.

original: thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i ma ning du de nyid slar yang gnas so //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i ma ning du de nyid slar yang gnas so //
translated: That is again present as a neuter, inseparable method and wisdom.

original: @156a * // de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: @156a * // de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bzhin lag kha dog dbyibs las ni //🔽zhes pa ste /
analyzed: bzhin lag kha dog dbyibs las ni // zhes pa ste /
translated: Due to the color, shape, and so on of the face and hands.

original: bzhin lag gi sgra ni phyag dang zhal la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: bzhin lag gi sgra ni phyag dang zhal la sogs pa'o //
translated: The term face and hands is the faces, hands, and so on.

original: kha dog gi sgra ni nag po dang ser po la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: kha dog gi sgra ni nag po dang ser po la sogs pa'o //
translated: The term color is black, yellow, and so on.

original: dbyibs kyi sgra ni mig la sogs pa'i khyad par ro //
analyzed: dbyibs kyi sgra ni mig la sogs pa'i khyad par ro //
translated: The word “form” refers to the distinctions of the eye, etc.

original: rim pa des na gnas so //
analyzed: rim pa des na gnas so //
translated: In this order, it abides.

original: gang la yod ce na skyes pa tsam gyis te /
analyzed: gang la yod ce na skyes pa tsam gyis te /
translated: In what way? “By mere birth,”

original: skyes pa'i dus na'o //
analyzed: skyes pa'i dus na'o //
translated: at the time of birth.

original: yang na skyes pa tsam ni lha mo'i padmo'i nang du son pa'i gnas skabs nas gzung ba nyid do //
analyzed: yang na skyes pa tsam ni lha mo'i padmo'i nang du son pa'i gnas skabs nas gzung ba nyid do //
translated: Or, “mere birth” is the state of being in the womb of the divine mother.

original: de cis ji ltar na de la mtshon pa ma yin pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: de cis ji ltar na de la mtshon pa ma yin pa gsungs pa /
translated: How is it that it is not perceived?

original: yang gi sgra ni gang gi phyir gyi don te /
analyzed: yang gi sgra ni gang gi phyir gyi don te /
translated: The word “ca” has the sense of “yasmāt,” because.

original: bag chags tha mal pas te tha mal pa mi shes pa'o //
analyzed: bag chags tha mal pas te tha mal pa mi shes pa'o //
translated: By the impressions of the ordinary, i.e., by the ordinary ignorance.

original: de rnams kyi bag chags kyi rgyu de'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de rnams kyi bag chags kyi rgyu de'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of the cause of those impressions.

original: yang yang shes pa yin na de mer mer por gyur pa'i rang bzhin nyid lag mdog dang dbyibs kyi bdag nyid du brjod do //
analyzed: yang yang shes pa yin na de mer mer por gyur pa'i rang bzhin nyid lag mdog dang dbyibs kyi bdag nyid du brjod do //
translated: If it is known again and again, it is said to be of the nature of the kalala, etc., having the nature of color and shape.

original: tha mal pas slar yang mi mthong ba yin no //
analyzed: tha mal pas slar yang mi mthong ba yin no //
translated: The ordinary person does not see it again.

original: 'di ji ltar yin pa de pes  bstan par byas pa /
analyzed: 'di ji ltar yin pa de pes  bstan par byas pa /
translated: How is this? He explains:

original: dug gi dum bu gang nyid kyis //
analyzed: dug gi dum bu gang nyid kyis //
translated: By that very piece of poison

original: skye bo thams cad 'chi bar 'gyur //
analyzed: skye bo thams cad 'chi bar 'gyur //
translated: all people die.

original: dug gi de nyid shes pa yis //
analyzed: dug gi de nyid shes pa yis //
translated: Just as poison is destroyed by poison,

original: dug gis dug ni 'joms par byed //
analyzed: dug gis dug ni 'joms par byed //
translated: by knowing the reality of poison.

original: re zhig dug zos pa tsam gyis dug gi nus pas srog chags thams cad 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: re zhig dug zos pa tsam gyis dug gi nus pas srog chags thams cad 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
translated: For, by the power of poison, all living beings die just from the mere ingestion of poison.

original: dug gi de nyid shes pa de ni dug gi de kho na nyid yongs su shes pa'o //
analyzed: dug gi de nyid shes pa de ni dug gi de kho na nyid yongs su shes pa'o //
translated: The knowledge of the reality of poison is the thorough knowledge of the reality of poison.

original: dug ni 'joms par byed ni sel bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: dug ni 'joms par byed ni sel bar byed pa'o //
translated: Poison is destroyed means it is removed.

original: 'dis ni thun mong ma yin par mthong ba'o //
analyzed: 'dis ni thun mong ma yin par mthong ba'o //
translated: This is the uncommon seeing.

original: gzhan yang gsungs pa /
analyzed: gzhan yang gsungs pa /
translated: Moreover, it is said:

original: ji ltar rlung gis zin de la /
analyzed: ji ltar rlung gis zin de la /
translated: For one seized by wind,

original: mon sran sde'u'i bza' ba sbyin //
analyzed: mon sran sde'u'i bza' ba sbyin //
translated: give him food of beans;

original: bzlog pa'i sman du brtag par bya //
analyzed: bzlog pa'i sman du brtag par bya //
translated: it should be considered a medicine to counteract.

original: rlung gis rlung la snun par byed //
analyzed: rlung gis rlung la snun par byed //
translated: Wind strikes against wind.

original: rlung gi nad kyis btab pa de la mon sran sde'u'i bza' bas nad cher 'phel bar byed par bshad pa las /
analyzed: rlung gi nad kyis btab pa de la mon sran sde'u'i bza' bas nad cher 'phel bar byed par bshad pa las /
translated: For one seized by a wind illness, it is explained that food of beans increases the illness.

original: de la mon sran sde'u'i bza' ba byin na de yang rlung gi nad 'joms par byed do //
analyzed: de la mon sran sde'u'i bza' ba byin na de yang rlung gi nad 'joms par byed do //
translated: But if one gives him food of beans, that will destroy the wind illness.

original: 'dis ni bzlog pa'i sman du brtag par bya ni //
analyzed: 'dis ni bzlog pa'i sman du brtag par bya ni //
translated: It should be considered a medicine to counteract.

original: phyin ci log tu byas pa nyid sman yin te /
analyzed: phyin ci log tu byas pa nyid sman yin te /
translated: The very perversion is the medicine.

original: nyes pa byed pa nyid yon tan byed pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: nyes pa byed pa nyid yon tan byed pa nyid yin no //
translated: The very fault is the virtue.

original: yon tan nyid thabs la mi mkhas pas zil gyis ma non na skyon du 'gyur la /
analyzed: yon tan nyid thabs la mi mkhas pas zil gyis ma non na skyon du 'gyur la /
translated: If virtue itself is not overcome by lack of skill in means, it becomes a fault.

original: skyon nyid thabs la mkhas pas zil gyis non na yon tan bskyed pa yin no //
analyzed: skyon nyid thabs la mkhas pas zil gyis non na yon tan bskyed pa yin no //
translated: The very fault, if overcome by skill in means, generates virtue.

original: de nyid gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid gsungs pa /
translated: He says just that:

original: srid pa nyid kyis srid pa dag / bzlog pa'i rtog las rnam rtog dag / ji ltar rna @156b bar chu zhugs pa //
analyzed: srid pa nyid kyis srid pa dag / bzlog pa'i rtog las rnam rtog dag / ji ltar rna @156b bar chu zhugs pa //
translated: “By existence itself, existence is to be overcome. The conception of conceptualization is like water in the ear.

original: chu gzhan gyis ni dbyung bar bya //
analyzed: chu gzhan gyis ni dbyung bar bya //
translated: It is to be removed by more water.

original: de bzhin dngos po'i rnam rtog kyang //
analyzed: de bzhin dngos po'i rnam rtog kyang //
translated: In the same way, the conceptualization of things

original: rnam par nges pas sbyang bar bya //
analyzed: rnam par nges pas sbyang bar bya //
translated: is to be purified by ascertainment.

original: srid pa ni skye ba ste kun rdzob kyi bden pa'o //
analyzed: srid pa ni skye ba ste kun rdzob kyi bden pa'o //
translated: Existence is birth, the conventional truth.

original: de srid pa nyid kyis dag pa ni skye ba med pa nyid kyis te /
analyzed: de srid pa nyid kyis dag pa ni skye ba med pa nyid kyis te /
translated: By existence itself, it is to be purified by non-birth.

original: skye ba ni ma skyes pa'i rang bzhin du rtog pa'i phyir kun rdzob kyi bden pa nyid don dam pa'i bden pa yin no //
analyzed: skye ba ni ma skyes pa'i rang bzhin du rtog pa'i phyir kun rdzob kyi bden pa nyid don dam pa'i bden pa yin no //
translated: Because birth is conceived as having the nature of non-birth, the conventional truth itself is the ultimate truth.

original: rnam rtog ces pa ni /
analyzed: rnam rtog ces pa ni /
translated: The word “thought”

original: srid pa'i mngon par zhen pa kun rdzob kyi bden pa rdzogs pa'o //
analyzed: srid pa'i mngon par zhen pa kun rdzob kyi bden pa rdzogs pa'o //
translated: is the perfection of the conventional truth, the attachment to existence.

original: de yang bzlog pa'i rtog pas ni /
analyzed: de yang bzlog pa'i rtog pas ni /
translated: And that is also the thought of reversal,

original: re re'i rtog pas te /
analyzed: re re'i rtog pas te /
translated: from the thought of each,

original: lha'i rnam pas rnam par dag pa las so //
analyzed: lha'i rnam pas rnam par dag pa las so //
translated: from the purity of the form of the deity.

original: yang na rnam rtog ces pa ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes ma ning ste de bzhin nyid kyi rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: yang na rnam rtog ces pa ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes ma ning ste de bzhin nyid kyi rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: Or else, the word “thought” is the neuter of nonconceptual intuition, the purity of thusness.

original: bzlog pa'i rtog pa las ni rtog pa re re lha'i rnam par dag pa las so //
analyzed: bzlog pa'i rtog pa las ni rtog pa re re lha'i rnam par dag pa las so //
translated: And that is also the thought of reversal, from the purity of the form of each deity.

original: lha'i rnam par dag pa nyid de bzhin nyid kyi rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: lha'i rnam par dag pa nyid de bzhin nyid kyi rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: The purity of the form of the deity is the purity of thusness.

original: bskyed pa'i rim pa nyid rdzogs pa'i rim pa yin pa'i don to //
analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pa nyid rdzogs pa'i rim pa yin pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the stage of development is the stage of completion.

original: ji ltar rna bar chu zhugs pa ;
analyzed: ji ltar rna bar chu zhugs pa ;
translated: Just as water that has entered the ear

original: / chu gzhan gyis ni dbyung bar bya //
analyzed: / chu gzhan gyis ni dbyung bar bya //
translated: is removed by more water,

original: de bzhin dngos po ni 'khor ba'i tshul gyi rnam par rtog pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin dngos po ni 'khor ba'i tshul gyi rnam par rtog pa'o //
translated: so too, the thought of things, the mode of cyclic existence,

original: rnam par nges pas ni lha'i rnam pas so //
analyzed: rnam par nges pas ni lha'i rnam pas so //
translated: is removed by the purity of the form of the deity.

original: sbyang bar bya ba ni gzugs la sogs pa phung po lnga'i 'khor ba lha'i rnam pas rnam par dag pa byas na shin tu rnam par dag pas chos kyi dbyings kyi bdag nyid du 'gyur ba yin pa'i don to //
analyzed: sbyang bar bya ba ni gzugs la sogs pa phung po lnga'i 'khor ba lha'i rnam pas rnam par dag pa byas na shin tu rnam par dag pas chos kyi dbyings kyi bdag nyid du 'gyur ba yin pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that if the cyclic existence of the five aggregates, form, etc., is purified by the aspect of the deity, it becomes the nature of the realm of truth by means of complete purification.

original: dpe gzhan yang gsungs pa /
analyzed: dpe gzhan yang gsungs pa /
translated: Another example is stated:

original: ji ltar me yis tshig pa la //
analyzed: ji ltar me yis tshig pa la //
translated: As one who is burned by fire

original: slar yang me yis gdung bar bya //
analyzed: slar yang me yis gdung bar bya //
translated: is burned again by fire,

original: de bzhin 'dod chags mes tshig pa //
analyzed: de bzhin 'dod chags mes tshig pa //
translated: so one who is burned by the fire of passion

original: 'dod chags me yis gdung bar bya //
analyzed: 'dod chags me yis gdung bar bya //
translated: is burned by the fire of passion.

original: 'jig rten na mes tshig na me nyid kyis gdungs pas me'i tsha ba zhi bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'jig rten na mes tshig na me nyid kyis gdungs pas me'i tsha ba zhi bar 'gyur ro //
translated: In the world, when one is burned by fire, one is healed by fire, and the heat of the fire is allayed.

original: de rnams bzhin du 'dod chags pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: de rnams bzhin du 'dod chags pa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: In the same way, one who is burned by the fire of passion is healed by the fire of passion.🔽That is, when one is burned by the fire of passion, one is healed by the fire of passion.

original: de nyid sdug bsngal skyed par byed pa yin pa'i phyir me dang 'dra bar des bsregs pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid sdug bsngal skyed par byed pa yin pa'i phyir me dang 'dra bar des bsregs pa'o //
translated: Since it is the cause of the origination of suffering, it is like fire. One is burned by it.

original: nyon mongs pas gdungs na de rnams kyi nyon mongs pa nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nyon mongs pas gdungs na de rnams kyi nyon mongs pa nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro //
translated: When one is tormented by the afflictions, the afflictions are allayed.

original: gang gis she na /
analyzed: gang gis she na /
translated: By what?

original: 'dod chags me yis te /
analyzed: 'dod chags me yis te /
translated: By the fire of passion.

original: chags pa'i me lha'i rnam par dag pa'i chags pa yin pa'i don to //
analyzed: chags pa'i me lha'i rnam par dag pa'i chags pa yin pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is: attachment that is purified in the form of the fire god of passion.

original: dug gi dum bu gang nyid kyis //
analyzed: dug gi dum bu gang nyid kyis //
translated: The very piece of poison

original: zhes pa ni phyi rol gyi dngos po'i de kho na nyid kyis bskyed pa'i skyon nyes pa yul gyi chags pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: zhes pa ni phyi rol gyi dngos po'i de kho na nyid kyis bskyed pa'i skyon nyes pa yul gyi chags pa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: This refers to the fault of the error produced by the reality of external things, which is characterized by attachment to objects.

original: ji ltar rlung gis zin pa de'i //🔽zhes bya ba la @157a * //
analyzed: ji ltar rlung gis zin pa de'i // zhes bya ba la @157a * //
translated: The one who is seized by the wind

original: sogs pas ni gang zag las byung ba'i dbang po'i mngon par zhen pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: sogs pas ni gang zag las byung ba'i dbang po'i mngon par zhen pa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: and so forth refers to the characteristic of the attachment of the sense faculties arising from the person.

original: ji ltar rna bar chu zhugs pa la sogs pas ni phyi dang nang gi yul dang dbang po gnyi ga chags pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: ji ltar rna bar chu zhugs pa la sogs pas ni phyi dang nang gi yul dang dbang po gnyi ga chags pa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: The one who is seized by the water in the ear and so forth refers to the characteristic of the attachment of both external objects and sense faculties.

original: ji ltar me yis tshig pa yang //
analyzed: ji ltar me yis tshig pa yang //
translated: The one who is burned by fire

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyi gas bskyed pa'i chags pa bde ba la sogs pa'i rnam par nyams su myong ba'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyi gas bskyed pa'i chags pa bde ba la sogs pa'i rnam par nyams su myong ba'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: and so forth refers to the characteristic of the experience of the form of pleasure and so on that is produced by both.

original: thams cad nyid rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa ste rang gi dngos po ni rang bzhin te /
analyzed: thams cad nyid rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa ste rang gi dngos po ni rang bzhin te /
translated: Everything is pure by nature, and its own nature is its own entity.

original: gang gis dngos po gang gi rang bzhin des rnam par dag pa yin te kun rdzob kyi bden pa rnam par dag pa nyid don dam pa'i bden pa de rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: gang gis dngos po gang gi rang bzhin des rnam par dag pa yin te kun rdzob kyi bden pa rnam par dag pa nyid don dam pa'i bden pa de rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: Whatever is the nature of any entity, that is its purity. The purity of conventional truth is itself the purity of ultimate truth.

original: bskyed pa'i rim pa nyid rdzogs pa'i rim pa yin pas de kho na nyid can gyi thams cad nyid chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pa nyid rdzogs pa'i rim pa yin pas de kho na nyid can gyi thams cad nyid chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin no //
translated: Since the creation stage itself is the completion stage, everything that has thatness has the nature of the utterly pure realm of phenomena.

original: rnam par ma dag pa cung zad kyang med par bsdu bar gsungs pa /
analyzed: rnam par ma dag pa cung zad kyang med par bsdu bar gsungs pa /
translated: It is said that nothing at all is impure.

original: skye bo mi bzad pa yi las //
analyzed: skye bo mi bzad pa yi las //
translated: The karma of beings is unbearable.

original: gang dang gang gi 'ching ba ni //🔽thabs dang bcas na 'di nyid kyis //
analyzed: gang dang gang gi 'ching ba ni // thabs dang bcas na 'di nyid kyis //
translated: Whatever bonds there are🔽are liberated from the bonds of existence

original: srid pa'i 'ching las grol bar 'gyur //
analyzed: srid pa'i 'ching las grol bar 'gyur //
translated: by this very method.

original: ni'i sgra ni gang gi phyir gyi don to //
analyzed: ni'i sgra ni gang gi phyir gyi don to //
translated: The word “ni” has the meaning of “because.”

original: gang dang gang gi mi bzad las ni drag po'i las so //
analyzed: gang dang gang gi mi bzad las ni drag po'i las so //
translated: “Whatever karma is unbearable” means intense karma.

original: skye bo ni srog chags so //
analyzed: skye bo ni srog chags so //
translated: “Beings” means living beings.

original: 'ching ba ni bcings par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: 'ching ba ni bcings par gyur pa'o //
translated: “Bound” means bound by the bonds of action.

original: de nyid kyi las kyis grol ba ni grol bar 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi las kyis grol ba ni grol bar 'gyur ba'o //
translated: “Liberated” means liberated by the action of that very [bond].

original: cis khyad 'phags she na /
analyzed: cis khyad 'phags she na /
translated: By what is it distinguished?

original: 'ang gi sgra ni gang gi phyir gyi don to //
analyzed: 'ang gi sgra ni gang gi phyir gyi don to //
translated: The word “also” has the sense of “because.”

original: thabs dang bcas pa ni thabs dang ldan par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: thabs dang bcas pa ni thabs dang ldan par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: “Along with the means” means endowed with the means.

original: thabs dang bcas pa des so //
analyzed: thabs dang bcas pa des so //
translated: By that very means.

original: de don ci zhe na /
analyzed: de don ci zhe na /
translated: What is its meaning?

original: don 'di'o // las kyi sgra ni yin gyi kun du rtog pa de nyid ma rig pa'i mngon par zhen pa yin pas mi bzad pa'i las zhes brjod do //
analyzed: don 'di'o // las kyi sgra ni yin gyi kun du rtog pa de nyid ma rig pa'i mngon par zhen pa yin pas mi bzad pa'i las zhes brjod do //
translated: This is its meaning: The word “action” is a synonym for that very conceptualization, and because it is the manifest clinging to ignorance, it is called “inexhaustible action.”

original: des bcing bar 'gyur ba ni /
analyzed: des bcing bar 'gyur ba ni /
translated: “Bound by that”

original: de nyid lta'i mngon par zhen pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid lta'i mngon par zhen pa'o //
translated: means the manifest clinging to that very view.

original: thabs dang bcas pa des na grol bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thabs dang bcas pa des na grol bar 'gyur ro //
translated: “Liberated by that very means”

original: de'i phyir bcings pa dang grol ba zhes bya ba yang ma rig pa dang de ldog pa yin gyi rang bzhin la ni bcings pa dang grol ba yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir bcings pa dang grol ba zhes bya ba yang ma rig pa dang de ldog pa yin gyi rang bzhin la ni bcings pa dang grol ba yod pa ma yin no //
translated: means liberated by the cessation of that very [clinging]. Therefore, “bound” and “liberated” are also ignorance and its cessation, but for the intrinsic nature there is no bondage or liberation.

original: 'ching ba'i rtog pas ni grol ba'i rtog pa la grol ba'i rtog pas ni 'ching ngo //
analyzed: 'ching ba'i rtog pas ni grol ba'i rtog pa la grol ba'i rtog pas ni 'ching ngo //
translated: The thought of bondage is liberated by the thought of liberation, and the thought of liberation is bound by the thought of bondage.

original: dper na thag pa 'khyil pa la sprul du snang ba na rang bzhin nyid la thag pa la sprul du snang ba ma 'khrul ba'o //
analyzed: dper na thag pa 'khyil pa la sprul du snang ba na rang bzhin nyid la thag pa la sprul du snang ba ma 'khrul ba'o //
translated: For example, when a coiled rope appears as a snake, the rope itself is not mistaken for a snake.

original: de la sprul du shes @157b pa ni 'khrul ba'o //
analyzed: de la sprul du shes @157b pa ni 'khrul ba'o //
translated: The knowledge that it is a snake is mistaken.

original: de nyid la ma rig pa zhes brjod do //
analyzed: de nyid la ma rig pa zhes brjod do //
translated: That is called ignorance.

original: de'i 'khrul pa nyid thag pa la sprul du 'khrul ba'i sa bon log nas thag pa 'khyil pa ma 'khrul par shes par grub pa nyid do //
analyzed: de'i 'khrul pa nyid thag pa la sprul du 'khrul ba'i sa bon log nas thag pa 'khyil pa ma 'khrul par shes par grub pa nyid do //
translated: When the seed of the mistake that the rope is a snake is eliminated, the coiled rope is known without mistake.

original: ma 'khrul pa'i rtog pa ni 'khrul par rtogs pas bsgrubs pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: ma 'khrul pa'i rtog pa ni 'khrul par rtogs pas bsgrubs pa'i phyir te /
translated: The thought of non-mistakenness is established by the thought of mistakenness.

original: 'khrul par shes pa med na yang ma 'khrul par shes pa yang cung zad kyang med pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'khrul par shes pa med na yang ma 'khrul par shes pa yang cung zad kyang med pa nyid do //
translated: For, if there is no knowledge of mistakenness, there is not the slightest knowledge of non-mistakenness.

original: de bas na kun rdzob kyi bden pa nyid don dam pa'i bden pa yin zhing bden pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid kho na nyams su myong ba'i rang bzhin yang dag pa'i shes pa yin no //
analyzed: de bas na kun rdzob kyi bden pa nyid don dam pa'i bden pa yin zhing bden pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid kho na nyams su myong ba'i rang bzhin yang dag pa'i shes pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the conventional truth itself is the ultimate truth, and the nature of the experience of the two truths is the authentic cognition.

original: yang na des bcings so //
analyzed: yang na des bcings so //
translated: Or, by that, one is bound.

original: cis she na /
analyzed: cis she na /
translated: By what?

original: mi bzad pa'i las kyis so //
analyzed: mi bzad pa'i las kyis so //
translated: By unbearable karma.🔽By what person?

original: skye bo gang gis ni srog chags bcings pa'o //
analyzed: skye bo gang gis ni srog chags bcings pa'o //
translated: By the person who binds living beings.

original: 'ang gi sgra ni khyad par gyi don te /
analyzed: 'ang gi sgra ni khyad par gyi don te /
translated: The word “also” has the meaning of distinction.

original: khyad par du grol to //
analyzed: khyad par du grol to //
translated: In particular, one is liberated.

original: cis she na /
analyzed: cis she na /
translated: By what?

original: rigs pa'i tshul gyis te /
analyzed: rigs pa'i tshul gyis te /
translated: By the principle.

original: theg pa chen po la sbyangs pas so //
analyzed: theg pa chen po la sbyangs pas so //
translated: By training in the Mahāyāna.

original: cir 'gyur zhe na /🔽thabs dang bcas pas te /
analyzed: cir 'gyur zhe na / thabs dang bcas pas te /
translated: What happens?🔽One is liberated together with the method.

original: thabs dang ldan pas so //
analyzed: thabs dang ldan pas so //
translated: One who possesses the method.

original: gang gsungs pa ;
analyzed: gang gsungs pa ;
translated: As it is said:

original: / thabs dang bral bar gyur ba'i phyir //
analyzed: / thabs dang bral bar gyur ba'i phyir //
translated: Because of being devoid of the method,

original: dngos med tsam zhig bsgrubs na yang //🔽rang gzhan don la nus pa ni //
analyzed: dngos med tsam zhig bsgrubs na yang // rang gzhan don la nus pa ni //
translated: even if one accomplishes mere non-entityness,🔽because one is not able to benefit oneself and others,

original: med phyir nam mkha'i me tog bzhin //🔽ces gsungs so //
analyzed: med phyir nam mkha'i me tog bzhin //🔽ces gsungs so //
translated: it is like a sky flower.

original: de phyir rdzogs pa'i rim pa bsgrub pa yang bskyed pa'i rim pa la ltos pa dang bcas pa yin pa'i don to //
analyzed: de phyir rdzogs pa'i rim pa bsgrub pa yang bskyed pa'i rim pa la ltos pa dang bcas pa yin pa'i don to //
translated: Therefore, the accomplishment of the completion stage also has the meaning of being dependent on the generation stage.

original: spyir mngon par bstan nas khyad par du nye bar bstan pa'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: spyir mngon par bstan nas khyad par du nye bar bstan pa'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: In general, after the explicit teaching, the special teaching is stated:

original: chags pas 'jig rten 'ching gyur pa //
analyzed: chags pas 'jig rten 'ching gyur pa //
translated: The world is bound by attachment,

original: 'dod chags nyid kyis rnam grol 'gyur //
analyzed: 'dod chags nyid kyis rnam grol 'gyur //
translated: and is liberated by attachment itself.

original: bzlog pa'i bsgom pa 'di rnams ni //
analyzed: bzlog pa'i bsgom pa 'di rnams ni //
translated: These meditations of reversal

original: sangs rgyas mu stegs pas mi shes //
analyzed: sangs rgyas mu stegs pas mi shes //
translated: are not known by the Buddhas or the tīrthikas.

original: chags pas zhes pa ni chags pa'i mtshan nyid kyis so //
analyzed: chags pas zhes pa ni chags pa'i mtshan nyid kyis so //
translated: “By attachment” means by the characteristic of attachment.

original: 'jig rten ni skye bo bcings pa'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten ni skye bo bcings pa'o //
translated: “The world” is the bound people.

original: 'dod chags nyid kyis ni lha'i rnam par dag pa chags pa'i mtshan nyid kyis rnam par grol lo //
analyzed: 'dod chags nyid kyis ni lha'i rnam par dag pa chags pa'i mtshan nyid kyis rnam par grol lo //
translated: “By attachment itself” means by the characteristic of attachment, the purity of the deity is liberated.

original: ni ni gang gi phyir gyi don to //
analyzed: ni ni gang gi phyir gyi don to //
translated: “Indeed” means “because.”

original: bzlog pa'i bsgom pa 'di rnams ni //
analyzed: bzlog pa'i bsgom pa 'di rnams ni //
translated: “These meditations of reversal”

original: zhes pa ni phyin ci log tu snyoms par zhugs pa 'di gang las so //
analyzed: zhes pa ni phyin ci log tu snyoms par zhugs pa 'di gang las so //
translated: means “from where are these meditations of reversal?”

original: 'di sangs rgyas mu stegs kyis mi shes ni nyan thos la sogs pa rang gi 'khor nyid kyis kyang gang du mi shes na /
analyzed: 'di sangs rgyas mu stegs kyis mi shes ni nyan thos la sogs pa rang gi 'khor nyid kyis kyang gang du mi shes na /
translated: This meditation of the reversal is not known by the Buddhas, much less by the non-Buddhists, since it is not known even by the disciples and so on, who are their own retinue.

original: lta ba gzhan la brten pa rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos zhes thabs kyi che ba'i bdag nyid bstan to //
analyzed: lta ba gzhan la brten pa rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos zhes thabs kyi che ba'i bdag nyid bstan to //
translated: Thus, it shows the greatness of the nature of the method.

original: yang na ni gang gi phyir ro //
analyzed: yang na ni gang gi phyir ro //
translated: Or else, it is because of that.

analyzed: 'di dag gi zhes pa ni mngon par brjed pa ste de gang la yod pa ni 'khor lo'o //

translated: The mandala-circle itself is the attainment of the stage of the union of the nature of the purification of the objects, etc. of the assembly of all the Tathagatas. The meaning of the expression mandala-circle is that.

analyzed: de bzhin du yang sdom pa de'i sdom pa'i rgyus kyang gnas pa yin na gnas pa dmigs par 'gyur ro //

analyzed: de cis gnas pa med pa'i rnal 'byor la gnas pa yin zhes pa'o //

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
