analyzed: rnam par nyed pa dang mtshan nyid dang bral bas kyang ngo //
translated: by means of the two-by-two, and by means of the four-by-four, and so on.

original: mang po'i tshig ni bsdu ba'o //
analyzed: mang po'i tshig ni bsdu ba'o //
translated: The word “also” is inclusive.

original: de bzhin zhes pa ni /
analyzed: de bzhin zhes pa ni /
translated: Likewise means

original: ji ltar de bzhin bzhi pa yang //
analyzed: ji ltar de bzhin bzhi pa yang //
translated: just as the fourth

original: zhes pa'i tshig gis so //
analyzed: zhes pa'i tshig gis so //
translated: is expressed by the word.

original: mtshan ma las shin tu 'das pas brjod du med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: mtshan ma las shin tu 'das pas brjod du med pa'i phyir /
translated: Since it is beyond all signs, it is inexpressible.

original: brjod du med pa'i bdag nyid de yang brjod du med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: brjod du med pa'i bdag nyid de yang brjod du med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Since it is inexpressible, it is of the nature of the inexpressible.

original: rang rig pa'i rang bzhin yang med cing rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa nyid gzhom du med pa'i dgongs pa'i skad 'od gsal ba gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin yin te /
analyzed: rang rig pa'i rang bzhin yang med cing rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa nyid gzhom du med pa'i dgongs pa'i skad 'od gsal ba gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin yin te /
translated: Since it is the nature of self-awareness, it is also nonexistent. Since the three vajras are indivisible, it is the indestructible intention, the luminous speech, the utterly pure nature of the originally unarisen dharmadhatu.

original: sgyu ma la sogs pa'i dpe bcu gnyis kyis @175b sbyar ba sku gsum gyi rang bzhin du khyab pa 'gro ba'i don bya ba la 'jug pa'i rgyu yin no //
analyzed: sgyu ma la sogs pa'i dpe bcu gnyis kyis @175b sbyar ba sku gsum gyi rang bzhin du khyab pa 'gro ba'i don bya ba la 'jug pa'i rgyu yin no //
translated: The twelve examples such as illusion are the cause for engaging in the benefit of beings, which is pervaded by the nature of the three kāyas.

original: skabs 'dir rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal pa /🔽'di nyid kyi yul yin pa'i phyir zhes dgongs so //🔽de ci'i na ngas bshad kyis /
analyzed: skabs 'dir rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal pa / 'di nyid kyi yul yin pa'i phyir zhes dgongs so // de ci'i na ngas bshad kyis /
translated: At this point, Vajrasattva declares,

original: khyod ni rtse gcig sems kyis nyon //
analyzed: khyod ni rtse gcig sems kyis nyon //
translated: “Since this is the domain of the three kāyas, listen with a one-pointed mind.”

original: ngas zhes pa ni n'a da gnyis kyi bdag nyid tshig gis brjod pa'o //
analyzed: ngas zhes pa ni n'a da gnyis kyi bdag nyid tshig gis brjod pa'o //
translated: “I” is expressed by the two words nādātma.

original: de yang nyan pa'i spyod yul longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o //
analyzed: de yang nyan pa'i spyod yul longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o //
translated: “This” is the sambhogakāya, the object of hearing.

original: khyod ni zhes pa ni sprul pa'i sku'o //
analyzed: khyod ni zhes pa ni sprul pa'i sku'o //
translated: “You” is the nirmāṇakāya.

original: rtse gcig sems zhes pa ni chos kyi sku dang dbyer med pas sku gsum dbyer med pa'o //
analyzed: rtse gcig sems zhes pa ni chos kyi sku dang dbyer med pas sku gsum dbyer med pa'o //
translated: “One-pointed mind” is the indivisibility of the three kāyas because of being inseparable from the dharmakāya.

original: de nyid gsungs pa /🔽dgongs pa'i skad dam 'dus pa'i skad kyang rung ste skad chen po'o //
analyzed: de nyid gsungs pa / dgongs pa'i skad dam 'dus pa'i skad kyang rung ste skad chen po'o //
translated: That is also explained:

original: dam tshig brda ni rgyas pa ru //
analyzed: dam tshig brda ni rgyas pa ru //
translated: “Listen” is the great sound of the language of the intention or the language of the assembly.🔽“The pledge” is the extensive symbolic language.

original: 'dus pa'i skad ces pa ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: 'dus pa'i skad ces pa ni bshad zin to //
translated: The term “language” has already been explained.

original: de nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Therefore,

original: skad chen po ni nyan thos la sogs pa'i spyod yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skad chen po ni nyan thos la sogs pa'i spyod yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: the great language is not the domain of experience of the śrāvakas and so on.

original: dam tshig brda ni rgyas pa ru //
analyzed: dam tshig brda ni rgyas pa ru //
translated: The symbolic language is extensive in the tantra.

original: zhes pa ni /
analyzed: zhes pa ni /
translated: This is

original: gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi lha rnams 'byung ba'i sa bon nyid kyis brda rgyas pa ste /
analyzed: gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi lha rnams 'byung ba'i sa bon nyid kyis brda rgyas pa ste /
translated: because the seed of the arising of the gods who are equal to the sands of the Ganges River is extensive.

original: sgra ji bzhin pa la sogs pa chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong gi tshogs yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgra ji bzhin pa la sogs pa chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong gi tshogs yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is the collection of the eighty-four thousand heaps of Dharma, such as the literal meaning and so on.

original: dgongs pa'i skad gsungs pa /🔽ma da na chang ba la sha //
analyzed: dgongs pa'i skad gsungs pa / ma da na chang ba la sha //
translated: The intended language is spoken.🔽The vagina is called madana.

original: 'du ba ma la ya dzam brjod //
analyzed: 'du ba ma la ya dzam brjod //
translated: The vulva is called malaya.

original: 'gro ba khe ta ro shr'a ba //
analyzed: 'gro ba khe ta ro shr'a ba //
translated: The path is called kheṭaka.

original: rus pa'i rgyan ni ri ram shu /
analyzed: rus pa'i rgyan ni ri ram shu /
translated: The bone ornament is called riṃśu.

original: 'ong ba phrem kha nam du brjod //
analyzed: 'ong ba phrem kha nam du brjod //
translated: The coming is called praṃkha.

original: cang te'u kri pi tu ru brjod //
analyzed: cang te'u kri pi tu ru brjod //
translated: The ḍamaru is called kṛpitu.

original: skal med dum du ram du brjod //
analyzed: skal med dum du ram du brjod //
translated: The unfortunate is called dumduma.

original: skal ldan ka lim dza rar 'dod //
analyzed: skal ldan ka lim dza rar 'dod //
translated: The fortunate is called kaliṃja.

original: reg med dind'i ma zhes brjod //
analyzed: reg med dind'i ma zhes brjod //
translated: The intangible is called dindīma.

original: thod pa padma bh'a dza na //
analyzed: thod pa padma bh'a dza na //
translated: The skull is called padmabhajana.

original: bza' ba tri pi ta zhes bya //🔽tshod ma m'a la tvinda nam //
analyzed: bza' ba tri pi ta zhes bya // tshod ma m'a la tvinda nam //
translated: The food is called tripita.🔽The vegetable is called maladvinda.

original: bshang ba tsa tu sa mar brjod //
analyzed: bshang ba tsa tu sa mar brjod //
translated: Excrement is called catusam.

original: gci pa kastu ri zhes brjod //
analyzed: gci pa kastu ri zhes brjod //
translated: Urine is called kashthuri.

original: rang 'byung si hlar shes par bya //
analyzed: rang 'byung si hlar shes par bya //
translated: One should know that the self-originated is sihla.

original: khu ba ka rb'ur zhes brjod //
analyzed: khu ba ka rb'ur zhes brjod //
translated: The semen is called karabuv.

original: sha chen s'a li dza zhes brjod //
analyzed: sha chen s'a li dza zhes brjod //
translated: The great flesh is called salija.

original: dbang po gnyis sbyor kun du du ru //
analyzed: dbang po gnyis sbyor kun du du ru //
translated: The union of the two organs is called kunduru.

original: rdo rje bo la zhes brjod de //
analyzed: rdo rje bo la zhes brjod de //
translated: The vajra is called bola.

original: padma kakko la zhes zer //
analyzed: padma kakko la zhes zer //
translated: The lotus is called kakkola.

original: yi ge'i dbye bas phye ba las //
analyzed: yi ge'i dbye bas phye ba las //
translated: From the division of the syllables,

original: rigs ni rnam pa lnga ru bshad //
analyzed: rigs ni rnam pa lnga ru bshad //
translated: the families are explained as five.

original: 'di ni gsang ba'i skad yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni gsang ba'i skad yin no //
translated: This is the secret language.

original: sangs rgyas lnga ni mthar thug pa //
analyzed: sangs rgyas lnga ni mthar thug pa //
translated: The five buddhas are the ultimate.

original: g-yung mo rdo rje'i rigs su bshad //🔽gar ma de bzhin padma'i rigs //
analyzed: g-yung mo rdo rje'i rigs su bshad // gar ma de bzhin padma'i rigs //
translated: The maiden is explained as the vajra family.🔽The dancer is likewise the lotus family.

original: rams 'tshed ma ni rin chen rigs //
analyzed: rams 'tshed ma ni rin chen rigs //
translated: The cook is the jewel family.

original: skye gnyis de bzhin gshegs par brjod //
analyzed: skye gnyis de bzhin gshegs par brjod //
translated: The prostitute is called the Tathagata.

original: tshos ma las kyi rigs nyid de //
analyzed: tshos ma las kyi rigs nyid de //
translated: The washerwoman is the karma family.

original: phyag rgya 'di rnams dngos grub ster //
analyzed: phyag rgya 'di rnams dngos grub ster //
translated: These consorts bestow spiritual powers.

original: ma da na chang zhes pa ni thugs @176a * //
analyzed: ma da na chang zhes pa ni thugs @176a * //
translated: Madana wine is the mind.

original: kyi rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin to //🔽ba la sha zhes pa ni sku rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: kyi rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin to // ba la sha zhes pa ni sku rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: is the samadhi of Vajra Body.🔽 Vajra of the body is the samadhi of Vajra Body.

original: 'du ba ma la ya dza zhes pa ni gsung rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin te /
analyzed: 'du ba ma la ya dza zhes pa ni gsung rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin te /
translated: Meeting at Malya is the samadhi of Vajra Speech.

original: chos kyi sku gsum bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: chos kyi sku gsum bstan pa yin no //
translated: This is the teaching of the three Bodies of Dharma.

original: 'gro ba khe ta zhes pa ni gsung rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: 'gro ba khe ta zhes pa ni gsung rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: Going to Khe is the samadhi of Vajra Speech.

original: ro shr'a ba zhes pa ni sku rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: ro shr'a ba zhes pa ni sku rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: Roshava is the samadhi of Vajra Body.

original: rus pa'i rgyan ni ni ram shu zhes pa ni thugs rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin te 'di rnams ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku gtso bor byas pa'i sku gsum bstan te //
analyzed: rus pa'i rgyan ni ni ram shu zhes pa ni thugs rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin te 'di rnams ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku gtso bor byas pa'i sku gsum bstan te //
translated: Bone ornaments is the samadhi of Vajra Mind. These are the teachings of the three Bodies, with the Body of Beatitude as the principal one.

original: 'ong ba phrem kha nam zhes pa ni thugs rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: 'ong ba phrem kha nam zhes pa ni thugs rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: Coming to Phemkha is the samadhi of Vajra Mind.

original: shes rab can zhes pa ni bod pa ste /🔽rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo'i rnam dag bstan to ;
analyzed: shes rab can zhes pa ni bod pa ste / rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo'i rnam dag bstan to ;
translated: The wise is the Tibetan word for invite.🔽This teaches the purity of the circle of yoginis.

original: / cang te'u kri pi ta zhes pa ni gsung rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: / cang te'u kri pi ta zhes pa ni gsung rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: Hand drum is the samadhi of Vajra Speech.

original: 'di ni sprul pa'i skur dmigs pa'i sku gsum bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni sprul pa'i skur dmigs pa'i sku gsum bstan pa yin no //
translated: This is the teaching of the three bodies, which are the focus of the emanation body.

original: lugs las bzlog pas rigs ni rnam pa lngar bshad pa ni 'di re re'i rigs rnam pa lnga po de yang ni mkha' 'gro ma bco lnga'i rang bzhin la re re zhing yang dkyil 'khor yin no //
analyzed: lugs las bzlog pas rigs ni rnam pa lngar bshad pa ni 'di re re'i rigs rnam pa lnga po de yang ni mkha' 'gro ma bco lnga'i rang bzhin la re re zhing yang dkyil 'khor yin no //
translated: The five types of family, which are the reverse of the natural order, are the five types of family of each of these, and each of them is a mandala, which is the nature of the fifteen dakinis.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa //
translated: The Bhagavat has said:

original: srid gsum yongs gyur thams cad ni //🔽gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs //
analyzed: srid gsum yongs gyur thams cad ni // gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs //
translated: All the transformations of the three worlds

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //
translated: are devoid of the apprehended and the apprehender.

original: 'di gang zhe na /
analyzed: 'di gang zhe na /
translated: What is that?

original: de ni rigs kyi dbye bas phye ba las te /
analyzed: de ni rigs kyi dbye bas phye ba las te /
translated: It is the division of the families.

original: yi ge'i dbye bas ni yi ge aa la sogs pa aam gi bar du dbyangs bco lnga rnams so //
analyzed: yi ge'i dbye bas ni yi ge aa la sogs pa aam gi bar du dbyangs bco lnga rnams so //
translated: The division of the syllables is the fifteen vowels from a to am.

original: de rnams kyi dbye bas ni sna tshogs pa nyid du phye bas /
analyzed: de rnams kyi dbye bas ni sna tshogs pa nyid du phye bas /
translated: The division of those is the division into varieties.

original: de las byung ba'i mkha' 'gro ma nyid ni rtsa'i gzugs sam sngags kyi gzugs su nyams su myong ba 'khor lo bzhir son pa'o //
analyzed: de las byung ba'i mkha' 'gro ma nyid ni rtsa'i gzugs sam sngags kyi gzugs su nyams su myong ba 'khor lo bzhir son pa'o //
translated: The dakinis that arise from them are experienced in the form of channels or mantras, and they reach the four chakras.

original: de nyid rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa'i rdo rje gsum gyi ngo bo mkha' 'gro ma bco lnga'i rang bzhin byang chub sems kyi ngo bo yi ge aa la sogs pa yongs su gyur pa las 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa'i rdo rje gsum gyi ngo bo mkha' 'gro ma bco lnga'i rang bzhin byang chub sems kyi ngo bo yi ge aa la sogs pa yongs su gyur pa las 'byung ba'o //
translated: That is the nature of the fifteen dakinis, the essence of the three indivisible vajras, the nature of the bodhicitta, the essence of the letter A, and so forth.

original: padma ni ye shes so //
analyzed: padma ni ye shes so //
translated: The lotus is wisdom.

original: kakko la zhes pa ni chos 'byung bdag med ma'o //
analyzed: kakko la zhes pa ni chos 'byung bdag med ma'o //
translated: The kakkola is the dharmodaya Nairatmya.

original: can zhes pa ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: can zhes pa ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
translated: The possessor is the vajra holder.

original: 'dod ces pa ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes nyid yin pa'i don to //
analyzed: 'dod ces pa ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes nyid yin pa'i don to //
translated: The desire is the meaning of the nondual wisdom.

original: skal ldan ka lim dza rar 'dod //
analyzed: skal ldan ka lim dza rar 'dod //
translated: The fortunate one is the desire of Kalimdza.

original: ces pa ni gsung rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin to //🔽rigs med dind'i ma ru brjod //
analyzed: ces pa ni gsung rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin to // rigs med dind'i ma ru brjod //
translated: This is the samadhi of Vajra Speech.

original: ces pa ni /
analyzed: ces pa ni /
translated: The one without lineage is called the Dindima Maru.

original: thugs rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: thugs rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: This is the samadhi of Vajra Mind.

original: thod pa padma'i snod yin te //🔽zhes pa ni /
analyzed: thod pa padma'i snod yin te // zhes pa ni /
translated: The skull is the vessel of the lotus.

original: sku rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: sku rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: This is the samadhi of Vajra Body.

original: 'dis ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur dmigs pa'i sku gsum bstan to //
analyzed: 'dis ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur dmigs pa'i sku gsum bstan to //
translated: This teaches the three bodies of the visualization of the samadhi of the enjoyment body.

original: bza' ba tri pi ta @176b zhes pa ni sku rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: bza' ba tri pi ta @176b zhes pa ni sku rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: The food called tripita is the samadhi of the Body Vajra.

original: tshod ma m'a la tvim da na //
analyzed: tshod ma m'a la tvim da na //
translated: The vegetables are maladvimdana.
